title: Taking the Gloves Off: Mason and Jessica
description: This is a free novella revisiting the characters from the Vampire Queen series, specifically Beloved Vampire, Book 4. It is posted on Joey W. Hill's website under http://storywitch.com/series-cantrips. Two volumes containing ALL the novella and short story character revisits written through 2016 are available for sale in ebook and print, but you can scroll below Cantrips 1 & 2 to find the individual stories still available as FREE downloads in the most common ebook formats.In this novella, Jessica decides to prove to her Master that she's ready to be all a vampire servant should be.
author: Joey W. Hill
